home.title: Welcome to Bozo
home.description1: In the heart of downtown Montreal, the House of Bozo will soon be born and reborn in the historic location of the very first song house in America. This project promises to revolutionize the cultural scene by offering a place where the unexpected becomes the norm. Conceived as a multi-dimensional space — acoustic concert hall, mini-museum full of rare pieces, café-bar in the heart of a florist and modular event space — the House of Bozo invites exploration of new artistic horizons.

musee.title: The Montreal Bozo Museum
musee.description: Dive into the history of America's first song house. A living museum celebrating Quebec's musical heritage.
